author: No No Nanette

review: My unit arrived defective.  It would not pick up a signal and would not respond to the remote control unless the control was no more than a foot away from it (and yes, I had new batteries in the control).  When I was able to get it to work, the picture was horrible and the sound was garbled.  I immediately switched over to my WII U system, loaded the Amazon app, and the picture and sound was fine.  Sending back for an exchange.  Will update my review when I receive the new one.
author: John Drago "Macro Enthusiast"

review: It worked well but used up my Androids wifi hotspot data too fast. So I have to return it because I couldn't mirror it without using the wifi.
